columns.name: eventCode
columns.description: Movement or milestone code. Can hold a named individual of the StatusCode core code list (corresponding to cXML code list 1.18)

columns.name: eventFor
columns.description: Refers to the URI of the linked object(s)

columns.name: eventTimeType
columns.description: Indicates type of event e.g.  Scheduled

columns.name: recordingActor
columns.description: Reference to the Actor recording the LogisticsEvent

columns.name: creationDate
columns.description: DateTime at which the LogisticsEvent was posted

columns.name: eventDate
columns.description: Date and time of the event

columns.name: partialEventIndicator
columns.description: Boolean indicating that the LogisticsEvent is only applicable for parts of the LogisticObject it was recorded for
